name: David Ramirez
text: I once dreamed that the Philippines was being invaded by aliens.     While I escaped from Manila on a passenger zeppelin, I looked out the window at the fire coming down from the dark sky onto the burning city.    The best fireworks I ever saw.    Eventually, we landed in California.     I wandered across the ruins of Oakland and then William Shatner showed up. He had declared himself sheriff of a group of survivors in California, and I was deciding whether or not to join.

source_obj.text: I once dreamed that the Philippines was being invaded by aliens.     While I escaped from Manila on a passenger zeppelin, I looked out the window at the fire coming down from the dark sky onto the burning city.    The best fireworks I ever saw.    Eventually, we landed in California.     I wandered across the ruins of Oakland and then William Shatner showed up. He had declared himself sheriff of a group of survivors in California, and I was deciding whether or not to join.
